name: Galaxy Force (benjames171)
description:
GALAXY FORCE is a horizontal scrolling shooter heavily inspired by SCRAMBLE, a 1981 arcade game by Konami.

There is a bullet hell aspect to the game alongside traditional shoot and dodge gameplay.

There are 4 increasingly tough levels to battle through.

Controls
WASD or ARROW keys to move
SPACE to shoot
Q to quit game

Made in a few days for Bullet Hell Jam #1

Contact
email: onesevenonegames@gmail.com
Twitter: twitter.com/BenJames171

Made with Defold
